TopicTitle: KAX Air-breathing rockets can be extreme...

Articles.Content:
I think that the jump-jets in the Kerbal Aircraft Expansions pack are a bit overpowered. Using nine of them, with one radial air-intake per motor, can take a "rocket" into orbit on a single stage... well, a few dozen m/s short obviously since you'll have to raise your Pe.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/klZ5wFQRokA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I never played with these in pre-1.0, so maybe they were just as O/P back then.
I don't think this goes here...
More of a demonstration of the mod parts themselves, so I'll move this over to General Add-on Affairs.
Did you use AJE or something? I think they are not really meant to go with an otherwise stock game anyway.

> 
> Did you use AJE or something? I think they are not really meant to go with an otherwise stock game anyway.

I believe this is just because KAX has not officially been patched to a 1.0 version yet.

> 
> I believe this is just because KAX has not officially been patched to a 1.0 version yet.

That is what I am thinking as well. Looking at the rated output, they should not be putting out this much thrust. No AJE. I am just messing around with some mods that I have not previously had time to explore, and seeing how they work, or don't work, with 1.0.
